wikipedia_page.main: Nicola Tappenden (born 1982) is an English model and former Page 3 girl (credited under her modelling name Nicola T). She featured in the 2010 edition of Celebrity Big Brother, where she was the sixth contestant evicted.

response: Walton began dating Nicola Tappenden, a glamour model, in 2007 and they went on to be engaged. He became a father in November 2008 when Tappenden gave birth to a baby girl named Poppy. His younger sister, Sophie, represented England at youth international level, and has played in the Women's Premier League and Women's Super League. Both Simon and Sophie studied at Boston Spa Academy during their time as Leeds United Academy scholars.

She had a cameo appearance in the movie Deuce Bigalow: European Gigolo as a window washerDeuce Bigalow: European Gigolo (2005) - Full Cast & Crew - IMDb in a wet white T-shirt. In the movie's special features, she is seen auditioning for the role against Page 3 models Michelle Marsh, Nicola Tappenden, and Nikkala Stott.

link_mentions.page: List of Celebrity Big Brother (British TV series) housemates

response: Nicola Tappenden, also known as Nicola T (born 2 December 1982), is an English Page 3 Girl, and glamour model. She was evicted on Day 25. After her eviction, 'Nicola T' was replaced in the Big Brother House by Davina McCall, on the 25th Day as part of a twist.
